title: Remove Product from a Collection
description: A product that was part of a seasonal collection is no longer relevant and needs to be removed from that collection page.

tasks.description: Identify the product SKU and the collection it needs to be removed from.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct product and collection identifiers.

tasks.description: Remove the product from the specified collection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the collection's product list.
